Package race

Class Creature

java.lang.Object
race.Creature
Direct Known Subclasses:
Monkey, Ostrich, Turtle
public abstract class Creature extends Object
Superclass to the animal classes, contains concrete and abstract methods. Handles all information about creatures, like name, a racetrack reference, their race position, maximum speed, etc. Each subclass overrides the move method and moves in a unique way
Author:
jackrutherford, bereketbessie
